updates.title: NPD Integration Added
updates.description: National Public Data search capability has been integrated to enhance address-based intelligence gathering with state-specific filtering.

updates.title: IntelX Integration Added
updates.description: We've successfully integrated IntelX to enhance our intelligence capabilities and provide more comprehensive search results.

updates.title: Discord Data Expansion
